body: Hemochem stops bleeding and promotes healing. A single dose of hemochem grants fast healing for 1 minute. Multiple doses injected do not stack, but they do reset the duration of the fast healing back to 1 minute. Five grades of hemochem exist; the fast healing granted by a dose depends on the pharmaceutical's grade, as detailed below.
name: Hemochem
price: 250 gp (Grade I), 500 gp (Grade II), 750 gp (Grade III), 1,000 gp (Grade IV), 1,250 gp (Grade V)

Construction.Craft: DC 23 (Grade I), DC 24 (Grade II), DC 25 (Grade III), DC 26 (Grade IV), DC 27 (Grade V)
Construction.Cost: 125 gp (Grade I), 250 gp (Grade II), 375 gp (Grade III), 500 gp (Grade IV), 625 (Grade V)

sections.body:
